channel.title: Reen development. Servers kinda close to done
channel.description:
Hello, Reenscape is a Runescape based server, no only pk or anything like that. So if u like runescape, then youd like this server once its completed.
www.Reenscape.net
Things added so far
[IMG]http://i85.photobucket.com/albums/k76/garrettjax/stats.jpg[/img]
Green means not complete red means complete
[IMG]http://i85.photobucket.com/albums/k76/garrettjax/magic_pic6.png[/img] Also added full magic the wave goes to the monster, then hits. Works on all spells!(Not ancients yet)
Some more stuff
Important X Update agreement - Making vars.php (Global variable file) - Admin Panel + Mod Panel + Forum Mod Panel - Support system - Complete forums
Not-So-Important - Fix up KB - Credits - Clans (Pages, forum, more) - User page update - Download page - Add ad template - Setup BBCode - Create Rich Text Editor
Fun stuff =3 - Highscore List - Online Trading Function
- Fixed tons of bugs - Fully working report abuse - Updated PasswordHelper - Fixed debugging - 100% Anti-crash, and automatically saves (No autorestarter needed!, Server will NEVER crash!) - Tutorial island(custom made 100% like runescape) done in 1-8 days.
ALL OF OUR SKILLS ARE CUSTOM MADE BY PEOPLE THAT ARE VERY GOOD A JAVA.

item.title: Reen development. Servers kinda close to done
item.dc:creator: @Crazyman Crazyman
item.description:
@Crazyman wrote:

Hello, Reenscape is a Runescape based server, no only pk or anything like that. So if u like runescape, then youd like this server once its completed.

www.Reenscape.net

Things added so far

Green means not complete red means complete


Also added full magic the wave goes to the monster, then hits.
Works on all spells!(Not ancients yet)

Some more stuff

Important
X Update agreement

  • Making vars.php (Global variable file)
  • Admin Panel + Mod Panel + Forum Mod Panel
  • Support system
  • Complete forums

Not-So-Important

  • Fix up KB
  • Credits
  • Clans (Pages, forum, more)
  • User page update
  • Download page
  • Add ad template
  • Setup BBCode
  • Create Rich Text Editor

Fun stuff =3

  • Highscore List

  • Online Trading Function

  • Fixed tons of bugs

  • Updated PasswordHelper

  • Fixed debugging

  • 100% Anti-crash, and automatically saves (No autorestarter needed!, Server will NEVER crash!)

  • Tutorial island(custom made 100% like runescape) done in 1-8 days.

ALL OF OUR SKILLS ARE CUSTOM MADE BY PEOPLE THAT ARE VERY GOOD A JAVA.
